title: I think my account is bugged can someone help me?
body: it has been over a month, that i received my last chest or key framgent, despite reaching 2 times mastery 5 on 2 different champs (normally a chest guaranteed) and getting numerous s/s+/s- in both the runs to lvl 5 with yi, and aatrox.. i fint it extremely frustrating not knowing what is going on. And i would like to get some support on this from anyone who can help me out. My summoner name is Season3wasbest. Some official response from riot members would be the best and would be nice. peace out

replies.body:
There are several reasons as to why you may not be getting chests at the moment. Each Summoner can get up to 4 chests per week, and these chests come back one chest per week. You can always check how long it will be until your next possible chest unlocks on your profile page.

You can also check all the finer details of chests on our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).
Yeah but i have not gotten anything in over one month, since my suspension ended.. that is not cool, at least tell me i wont get anything since i got suspended.
